General.Name: Small Pharma Inc
General.Description: Small Pharma Inc., a biotechnology company, focuses on developing short-duration psychedelic-assisted therapies for the treatment of mental health conditions. Its clinical program is based on N,N, dimethyltryptamine, a naturally occurring psychoactive molecule. The company's product includes SPL026, which is in clinical Phase IIa for the treatment of major depressive disorder; and SPL028, an injectable formulation of deuterated DMT, which is in Phase 1 clinical trial, as well as SPL801B, an oral dosage. Its preclinical stage programs include SPL029, an oral formulation of a tryptamine to treat depressive disorder. The company is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 6-8 Bonhill Street, London, United Kingdom, EC2A 4BX
